data.message: WOULD SOMEONE LIKE TO TELL ME WHATS SO FUNYN ABOUT THIS! THESE PEOPLE IN THIS VIDEO WERE BRAVE ENOUGH TO TALK ABOUT THEIR LIFE FOR THE BENIFIT OF YOU! AND UR LAUGHING! SO ONE DAY IF YOU CHILD COMES UP TO YOU AND SAYS MUM/DAD IM GAY YOUR GONNA LAUGH IN THEIR FACE!?! THIS VIDEO IS PROMPTING PEOPLE TO ACCEPT THEMSELVES AND YOU FIND THIS FUNNY! THIS IS NOT FUNNY! YOU HAVE TO BE SICK IN THE HEAD TO FIND THIS FUNNY! DID YOU NOT HEAR WHAT THE FIRST PERSON SAID!?! HE SAID IN THE VIDEO THAT HE WAS GOING TO KILL HIMSELF AND YOU FIND THAT HILARIOUS! MY DAD KILLED HIMSELF AND I TOOK THE FACT YOUR LAUGHING ABOUT IT, OFFENSIVLY YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELVES, THANKS FACEBOOK FOR THE VIDEO!
